professional_summary: Academic leader with 26 years of experience in engineering education, innovation leadership, and institutional growth. Currently serving as Professor & Head (AI & ML) and Convener, Institution's Innovation Council (IIC) at Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering (DSCE). Recognized for building high-impact innovation ecosystem, implementing national policies (NISP, MoE–IIC), mentoring institutions and startups, and contributing to national innovation ranking and institutional excellence.
core_competencies: Startup Incubation, Pre-Incubation & Technology Transfer Expertise
Organizing FDPs, Student Development & Faculty Enablement

professional_experience.position: Professor & Head – Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
professional_experience.institution: Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering, Bengaluru
Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering, Bengaluru
Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology Mumbai
Ballari Institute of Technology and Management

iic_contributions: Lead institutional innovation strategy aligned with MoE's IIC framework and National Innovation & Startup Policy (NISP).
Key contributor to DSCE achieving NIRF Innovation Ranking (50–100 band) and consistent 4-Star MIC rating for three consecutive years.
Secured AICTE funding to mentor five HEIs in building robust Innovation & Entrepreneurship (I&E) ecosystems.
Coordinated 400+ innovation, entrepreneurship, research, IPR, and startup activities fostering campus-wide I&E culture in the past 3 years.
Represented DSCE at IIC Regional Meets and national forums as Panelist, Keynote Speaker, and Expert Resource Person.
Organized multiple FDPs and Student Development Programs on innovation, research, IPR, and entrepreneurship.
Mentored more than 25 YUKTI nominations representing DSCE at national-level pitches.
Served as DSCE SPOC for Smart India Hackathon (SIH); enabled five teams to emerge as national winners this year.
Established and coordinated pre-incubation and incubation activities in collaboration with startups under MoUs.
Led curriculum integration of innovation, entrepreneurship, and SDGs within the AI & ML department.
institutional_leadership_and_governance: Member, National Innovation & Startup Policy (NISP) Committee – DSCE
Contributor to institutional strategy, accreditation, ranking submissions, and quality assurance initiatives
Mentor for faculty and student innovation leaders and ambassadors across departments
key_achievements_and_impact: Institutionalized innovation governance mechanisms aligned with national policy frameworks
Built sustainable industry partnerships and startup mentoring pipelines
Enhanced institutional reputation through national rankings, awards, and flagship innovation programs
Enabled student-led innovations to transition from ideation to national recognition and startup pathways
Recognized with institutional and national accolades for excellence in innovation leadership and coordination
research_experience: Ph.D. in Computer Vision under ER&IPR DRDO funded projects
Part of four funded research projects in various capacities – Currently PI for Industry Funded Research Project
More than 30 Publications in peer-reviewed journals and reputed international conferences
2 patents granted, 2 Patents at examination stage and 4 published
Active contributor to research, innovation education, and applied AI domains

organised_conducted: Faculty Enablement Programs in innovation leadership, research governance, and academic administration
Training in IPR, startup mentoring, technology commercialization, and entrepreneurship education
Participation in national innovation forums, policy workshops, and leadership summits
